message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $1,300,000. Given its worth, I believe this is a very fair price.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. However, I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $1,200,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its worth to me.

Bob, I understand your desire to find a good deal.  While $1,200,000 is a strong offer, this product represents a significant opportunity and I can't let it go below $1,275,000. I'm confident this is more than fair considering the value you'll gain.

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1,225,000 for the product. I think this is a reasonable compromise considering the value I'll get from it.
